Package com.ryder.webParser

Class WebParser

java.lang.Object
com.ryder.webParser.WebParser
public class WebParser extends Object
Looks for urls with products name on given we page. It finds two formats (old and new).

  • Constructor Details

    • WebParser

      public WebParser()

  • Method Details

    • parseSite

      public static void parseSite​(String url)
      First it downloads the page. Then it parses for old formatted products. Those can contains Polish symbols in url. They are not updated, so if url is unparseable it looks for a file in already downloaded library. After that in looks for new way formatted products. The urls are coded and doesn't contain Polish symbols. Those are updated.
      Parameters:
      url - the page address

    • updateProduct

      private static void updateProduct​(LinkParser data)
      If product exist it updates it's label's url. If found name matches to permission number it saves data in this product. In other case it looks for product that variants of name matches to found one.
      Parameters:
      data - product info

    • extractedUpdate

      private static void extractedUpdate​(LinkParser data, Boolean isSmall, ProductLabel container)
      Saves given url in given product and then parse the label to find userecord info
      Parameters:
      data - products info
      isSmall - is this label for small area permission
      container - product

    • fillProductUrl

      @Deprecated private static boolean fillProductUrl​(LinkParser container, int position)
      Deprecated.
      It tries to find product in existing database by variations of it's name.
      Parameters:
      container - product
      position - url for small area permission or not
      Returns:
      false if any exception occurred, other case true

    • fillProductUrlIfEmpty

      private static void fillProductUrlIfEmpty​(LinkParser container, int position)
      Saves url in every product if its url are empty.
      Parameters:
      container - product
      position - url for small area permission or not

    • takeCare

      private static void takeCare​(LinkParser container, int pos, String codeName)
      Looks for product under given name and fills it's url if its null
      Parameters:
      container - product data
      pos - is this url for small area or not
      codeName - variation of the product name

    • fillIfMPT

      private static void fillIfMPT​(LinkParser container, int position, ProductLabel tmp)
      If pointed url in given product is null, the new url is saved under pointed location
      Parameters:
      container - product info
      position - is this url for small area or not
      tmp - product
